name: Maze: The Ritual
description:
This is a game I developed solo in about a week, just to learn the ins and outs of Bitsy. In an attempt to make something a bit out of the ordinary with it!

You wake up to find yourself trapped in an unknown underground maze. Explore the maze and find your way out!
Instructions:

Use your arrow keys to move.
↑: Forward
↓: Backward
→: Turn Right
←: Turn Left

If on a mobile browser, then just swipe in the direction you want to move.

To help keep your bearings in the maze, the compass' arrows will highlight which cardinal direction you're facing.

While exploring the dungeon, your compass' North arrow may be replaced with an exclamation mark ( ! ) This indicates that something can be investigated. Press the ↑ key or swipe up to do so.

Protip: If you end up getting lost in the maze don't hesitate to bust out some graph paper! ;)
